add_a_default_offset: Add a default offset to automatically apply it to all placements of this labware on the deck
align_to_top_of_labware: Align to the top of labware
all_modules_and_labware_from_protocol: All modules and all labware used in the protocol {{protocol_name}}
changing_default_not_update_hardcoded: Changing the default offset will not automatically update hardcoded offsets
check_remaining_labware_with_primary_pip: Check remaining labware with {{primary_mount}} Pipette and tip
check_tip_location: the top of the tip in the A1 position
clear_deck_all_lw_all_modules_from: Clear all deck slots of labware and remove any modules from {{slot}}
clear_deck_all_lw_leave_modules: Clear all deck slots of labware, leaving modules in place
close_and_apply_offset_data: Close and apply labware offset data
confirm_go_back_without_saving: Are you sure you want to go back to the the labware list without saving?
confirm_pick_up_tip_modal_title: Did the pipette pick up a tip successfully?
confirm_position_and_return_tip: Confirm position, return tip to Slot {{next_slot}} and home
default_offset_description: The default offset is used for all placements of the labware unless a manual adjustment is made to specific slot location.
ensure_nozzle_position_desktop: <block>Ensure that the {{tip_type}} is centered above and level with {{item_location}}. If it isn't, use the controls below or your keyboard to jog the pipette until it is properly aligned.</block>
ensure_nozzle_position_odd: <block>Ensure that the {{tip_type}} is centered above and level with {{item_location}}. If it isn't, tap <bold>Move pipette</bold> and then jog the pipette until it is properly aligned.</block>
ensure_probe_attached: Ensure it is properly attached before proceeding.
exit_screen_confirm_exit: Exit and discard all labware offsets
exit_screen_go_back: Go back to labware position check
exit_screen_subtitle: If you exit now, only the labware offsets you've confirmed will be applied to this run.
exit_screen_title: Exit before completing Labware Position Check?
go_back_confirmation: Are you sure you want to go back to the the labware list without saving?
hardcoded_offsets_changed_in_python: Hardcoded offsets must be changed in your Python protocol
install_probe_1ch: <block>Take the calibration probe from its storage location. Ensure the collar is fully unlocked. Push the pipette ejector up and press the probe firmly onto the pipette nozzle as far as it can go. Twist the collar to lock the probe.</block><block>Test that the probe is secure by gently pulling it back and forth. It should be firmly in place.</block>
install_probe_8ch: Take the calibration probe from its storage location. Ensure the collar is fully unlocked. Push the pipette ejector up and press the probe firmly onto the backmost pipette nozzle as far as it can go. Twist the collar to lock the probe.Test that the probe is secure by gently pulling it back and forth. It should be firmly in place.
install_probe_96ch: Take the calibration probe from its storage location. Ensure the collar is fully unlocked. Push the pipette ejector up and press the probe firmly onto the A1 (back left corner) pipette nozzle as far as it can go. Twist the collar to lock the probe.Test that the probe is secure by gently pulling it back and forth. It should be firmly in place.
labware_offsets_deleted_warning: Once you begin Labware Position Check, previously created Labware Offsets will be discarded.
labware_offsets_summary_title: Labware Offsets to be applied to this run
labware_position_check_description: <block>Labware Position Check is a guided workflow that checks labware on the deck for an added degree of precision in your protocol.</block><block>To get started, gather the needed equipment shown to the right.</block>
labware_step_detail_labware: The tip should be centered above A1 in <italic>{{labware_name}}</italic> and <bold>level</bold> with the top of the labware.
labware_step_detail_labware_plural: The tips should be centered above column 1 in <italic>{{labware_name}}</italic> and <bold>level</bold> with the top of the labware.
labware_step_detail_link: See how to tell if the pipette is centered
labware_step_detail_modal_heading: How to tell if the pipette is centered and level
labware_step_detail_modal_nozzle: To ensure that the nozzle is centered, check from a second side of your OT-2.
labware_step_detail_modal_nozzle_image_1: Viewed from front, it appears centered...
labware_step_detail_modal_nozzle_image_2: ...but viewed from side, it requires adjustment
labware_step_detail_modal_nozzle_or_tip: To ensure the nozzle or tip is level with the top of the labware, position yourself at eye-level and/or slide a sheet of paper between the nozzle and tip.
labware_step_detail_modal_nozzle_or_tip_: Viewed from standing height, it appears level...
... but viewed from eye-level, it requires adjustment
If youâ€™re having trouble, slide 1 sheet of printer paper between the nozzle and the tip. A single piece of paper should barely pass between them.
labware_step_detail_tiprack: The pipette nozzle should be centered above A1 in <italic>{{tiprack_name}}</italic> and <bold>level</bold> with the top of the tip.
labware_step_detail_tiprack_plural: The pipette nozzles should be centered above column 1 in <italic>{{tiprack_name}}</italic> and <bold>level</bold> with the top of the tips.
legacy_clear_all_slots: Clear all deck slots of labware, leaving modules in place
legacy_clear_all_slots_odd: Clear all deck slots of labware
legacy_install_probe: Take the calibration probe from its storage location. Ensure its collar is fully unlocked. Push the pipette ejector up and press the probe firmly onto the <bold>{{location}}</bold> pipette nozzle as far as it can go. Twist the collar to lock the probe. Test that the probe is secure by gently pulling it back and forth.
legacy_labware_position_check_descriptio: <block>Labware Position Check is a guided workflow that checks every labware on the deck for an added degree of precision in your protocol.</block><block>Labware Position Check first checks tip racks, and then checks all other labware used in your protocol.</block>
modify_hardcoded_offsets_in_protocol: Hardcoded offsets must be changed in your Python protocol
move_to_a1_position: Move the pipette to line up in the A1 position
no_offset_data_on_robot: This robot has no useable labware offset data for this run.
pick_up_tip_from_rack_in_location: Pick up tip from tip rack in {{location}}
place_labware_in_adapter_in_location: Place a <bold>{{adapter}}</bold> followed by a <bold>{{labware}}</bold> into <bold>{{location}}</bold>
place_previous_tip_rack_in_location: Place the <bold>{{tip_rack}}</bold> that you used before back into <bold>{{location}}</bold>. The pipette will return tips to their original location in the rack.
position_check_description: <block>Labware Position Check is a guided workflow that checks every labware on the deck for an added degree of precision in your protocol.</block><block>When you check a labware, the OT-2â€™s pipette nozzle or attached tip will stop at the center of the A1 well. If the pipette nozzle or tip is not centered, you can reveal the OT-2â€™s jog controls to make an adjustment. This Labware Offset will be applied to the entire labware. Offset data is measured to the nearest 1/10th mm and can be made in the X, Y and/or Z directions.</block>
primary_pipette_tipracks_section: Check tip racks with {{primary_mount}} Pipette and pick up a tip
remove_probe: Unlock the calibraiton probe, remove it from the nozzle, and return it to its storage location.
remove_probe_before_exit: Remove the calibration probe before exiting
remove_probe_before_exiting_error: First, remove the calibration probe before exiting. Then, restart Labware Position Check to continue.
robot_has_no_offsets_from_previous_runs: <block>Labware offset data references previous protocol run labware locations to save you time. If all the labware in this protocol have been checked in previous runs, that data will be applied to this run.</block> <block>You can add new offsets with Labware Position Check in later steps.</block>
robot_has_offsets_from_previous_runs: This robot has offsets for labware used in this protocol. If you apply these offsets, you can still adjust them with Labware Position Check.
robot_in_motion: Stand back, robot is in motion.
select_labware_to_view_data: Select a labware to view its stored offset data.
specific_slots_can_be_adjusted: Specific slot locations can be adjusted as needed
start_position_check: begin labware position check, move to Slot {{initial_labware_slot}}
store_probe: Before exiting, unlock the calibration probe, remove it from the nozzle, and return it to its storage location.
stored_offsets_for_this_protocol: Stored Labware Offset data that applies to this protocol
